snippet: The dormancy of a 6.4-acre parcel in Midtown Manhattan overlooking the East River is an enigmatic and confusing tale of ambition, infighting, personality conflicts and bad timing.
abstract: Dormancy of 6.4-acre parcel in Midtown Manhattan overlooking the East River is an enigmatic and confusing tale of ambition and bad timing; at center of story is Sheldon H Solow, irascible billionaire developer who remains silent on his motives for leaving land untouched; Solow must build foundation for planned office building or one of several apartment towers by November or risk losing permits and public approvals.
lead_paragraph: The dormancy of a 6.4-acre parcel in Midtown Manhattan overlooking the East River is an enigmatic and confusing tale of ambition, infighting, personality conflicts and bad timing.

headline.main: Prime Lot, Empty for Years (Yes, This Is Manhattan)
headline.print_headline: Prime Lot, Empty for Years (Yes, This Is Manhattan)
